title: I Tråd Med Verden
description: During our second semester, we undertook the project of creating a web feature for “I Tråd Med Verden,” a socio-economic business focused on offering employment opportunities to vulnerable individuals through textile design. Our main objective was to design a digital solution that would enhance customer engagement by highlighting the inspiring stories of the women involved in the initiative, ultimately driving more traffic to their website.

title: Project Two
description: This is a brief description of Project Two.
